name: isObject
description:
Determines whether a value is an object.
 True, if the value represents a CFML object. False if
 the value is any other type of data, such as an integer, string,
 date, or struct.

examples.title: isObject Example
examples.description: Returns true if the parameter is a CFML object. The CFML object here is a Java object.

examples.title: isObject Example for Other Data Types
examples.description: Returns false if the parameter is any data type other than a CFML object
examples.code:
example = { 'name' = 'I am a struct' };
writeOutput( isObject( example ) );
